APIM_Compliance_Platform_stv2.explanation: The API Management service should be migrated to the stv2 platform. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/api-management/migrate-stv1-to-stv2-no-vnet

APIM_Availability_Zones.explanation: The API Management service should be configured with availability zones for higher availability. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/api-management/api-management-availability-zones

APIM_Deployment_Private_Endpoint_Connect.explanation: The API Management service should be configured with private endpoint connections. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/private-link/private-endpoint-overview

APIM_API_API_Version.explanation: The API Management service should be running at least version 2021-01-01.

APIM_Security_Backend_Certificates.explanation: The API Management service should not be configured with the following retired protocols TLS1.0, TLS1.1 and SSL3.0. For more information:

APIM_Security_Client_Certificate.explanation: The API Management service should have client certificate enabled

APIM_Security_Secure_Ciphers.explanation: The API Management service should not have weak ciphers

APIM_API_Named_Values.explanaion: The API Management service should have all name values encrypted as key vault secrets

APIM_Deployment_Locations.explanation: The API Management should have instances across multiple regions to enhance service availability and resilience
